plot: An investigative report inside the realm, and inside the mind, of one of the most effective and brutal tyrants of the past 50 years: Slobodan Milosevic.
title: A Very Modern Dictator: A Profile of Slobodan Milosevic
plot_es: An investigative report inside the realm, and inside the mind, of one of the most effective and brutal tyrants of the past 50 years: Slobodan Milosevic.
original_name: A Very Modern Dictator: A Profile of Slobodan Milosevic
